PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15772010-12-09,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectPhthalates Regulations
PrecisPHTHALATES REGULATIONS to restrict the sale, importation and advertising in Canada of products that present a likely or potential risk for children to develop adverse health effects from exposure to phthalates by aligning Canadian requirements for phthalates in soft vinyl children’s toys and child care articles with those of the United States and the European Union.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0298 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Phthalates Regulations
precis: PHTHALATES REGULATIONS to restrict the sale, importation and advertising in Canada of products that present a likely or potential risk for children to develop adverse health effects from exposure to phthalates by aligning Canadian requirements for phthalates in soft vinyl children’s toys and child care articles with those of the United States and the European Union.
